explanation: [0-0] A person wearing black clothes faces the camera with his hands up. His left hand is extended vertically with fingers together, while his right index finger is placed on the upper half of his left thumb, and the remaining fingers of his left hand are bent towards the palm.

[0-4] Then, his left thumb slides down along his right hand, followed by his right hand reaching into his pocket and taking something out. Afterward, he places his right index finger on his left index finger, then bends his left index finger and lifts his thumb upward. His right hand reaches into his pocket again, takes something out, still places it on his left index finger, and pulls his left index finger upward.

[4-12] The scene switches to a man wearing a pink T-shirt, a red hat, and a beard, standing in a white room. He extends his right hand with his fingers together except for his thumb, and his left index finger rests on his bent thumb, with the remaining three fingers spread. Then he moves his left hand left and right while maintaining this posture. Subsequently, the scene changes, and the man extends his right hand towards the camera with his thumb at a right angle to his palm, and his other four fingers straight. He then raises his left hand, with his thumb also bent at a right angle to his palm, his index finger resting on his thumb, and his other three fingers spread. Next, he puts the bent parts of his two thumbs together, then moves his left hand left and right, revealing the secret of this action. Finally, the man smiles at the camera, making an OK gesture with both hands, and the screen fades to black.
